siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: With this free Chrome extension, you can watch any Netflix show while we coach you through simple bodyweight exercises in the corner of your screen.
blogPost.body: With this free Chrome extension, you can watch any Netflix show while we coach you through simple bodyweight exercises in the corner of your screen.
blogPost.title: Netflex - Watch Netflix and work out at the same time.
blogPost.author: Jenny Nicholson

localize.description: 通过这个免费的Chrome扩展，您可以观看任何Netflix节目，同时我们通过屏幕角落里的简单体重练习来指导您。
通過這個免費的Chrome擴展，您可以觀看任何Netflix節目，同時我們通過屏幕角落裏的簡單體重練習來指導您。

previous.excerpt: Afino is a web-based app that makes it easy for managers and leaders to keep their team connected, engaged, and productive. With Afino, you can quickly and easily set up fun team events, track important metrics, and find ways to boost team health.
previous.title: Afino - Build a great culture for your team, from anywhere.

localize.description: Afino是一款基于网络的应用程序，它可以让管理者和领导者轻松地保持团队的联系、参与和生产力。有了Afino，你可以快速、轻松地设置有趣的团队活动，跟踪重要的指标，并找到促进团队健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 从任何地方为您的团队建立一个良好的文化。

localize.description: Afino是一款基於網絡的應用程序，它可以讓管理者和領導者輕鬆地保持團隊的聯繫、參與和生產力。有了Afino，你可以快速、輕鬆地設置有趣的團隊活動，跟蹤重要的指標，並找到促進團隊健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 從任何地方爲您的團隊建立一個良好的文化。
